title: 【求助帖】关于云服务器
author: African_Cat
txt_content:
Xftp和Xshell都可以连接到服务器，Xftp查看文件也都正常，但用Xshell访问文件夹时提示
No such file or directory，请问有谁知道怎么解决吗

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
African_Cat 发表于 2020-6-28 21:47
https://c-t.work/s/094da545d1c84c
cd Minecraft_S
请自行阅读 https://www.runoob.com/linux/linux-tutorial.html
